mapper.insert: INSERT INTO M_OP_OPERATOR ( OPRTR_ID, GRP_ID, SYSTEM_CD, OPRTR_PSWD, OPRTR_NM, OPRTR_JBTTL, OPRTR_DEPT, UPDT_DT, NOTE, OPRTR_GRD, USE_YN, OPRTR_EMAIL, OPRTR_TEL, ADDNG_CD, USE_STPLAT_AGRE, PRVC_MNG_POLCY_AGRE, OPRTR_STTS_CD , OPRTR_REGIST_DD, LAYOUT_NO, MNG_INST_CD ) VALUES ( (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(OPRTR_ID)+1,1) FROM M_OP_OPERATOR), #{grpId}, #{systemCd}, #{oprtrPswd}, #{oprtrNm}, #{oprtrJbttl}, #{oprtrDept}, NOW(), #{note}, #{oprtrGrd}, #{useYn}, #{oprtrEmail}, #{oprtrTel}, #{addngCd}, #{useStplatAgre}, #{prvcMngPolcyAgre}, #{oprtrSttsCd}, TO_CHAR(NOW(),'YYYYMMDD'), #{layoutNo}, #{mngInstCd} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM M_OP_OPERATOR WHERE OPRTR_EMAIL = #{oprtrEmail}
SELECT OPRTR_ID, SYSTEM_CD, OPRTR_PSWD, OPRTR_NM, OPRTR_JBTTL, OPRTR_DEPT, UPDT_DT, NOTE, OPRTR_GRD, MNG_INST_CD, USE_YN FROM M_OP_OPERATOR WHERE OPRTR_EMAIL = #{oprtrEmail} AND OPRTR_NM = #{oprtrNm}

SELECT MOO.OPRTR_ID, MOO.SYSTEM_CD, MOO.OPRTR_PSWD, MOO.OPRTR_NM, MOO.OPRTR_JBTTL, MOO.OPRTR_DEPT, MOO.UPDT_DT, MOO.NOTE, MOO.OPRTR_GRD, MOO.USE_YN, MOO.OPRTR_EMAIL, MOO.OPRTR_TEL, MOO.GRP_ID, MOO.OPRTR_STTS_CD, MOO.ADDNG_CD, MOO.MNG_INST_CD, MOO.OPRTR_STTS_CD, MOA.AUTH_CD FROM M_OP_OPERATOR MOO INNER JOIN M_OP_GRP_INFO MOGI ON MOO.GRP_ID = MOGI.GRP_ID INNER JOIN M_OP_AUTHORITY MOA ON MOA.AUTH_ID = MOGI.AUTH_ID WHERE OPRTR_EMAIL = #{oprtrEmail} AND OPRTR_NM = #{oprtrNm} AND OPRTR_TEL = #{oprtrTel}

SELECT OPRTR_ID, SYSTEM_CD, OPRTR_PSWD, OPRTR_NM, OPRTR_JBTTL, OPRTR_DEPT, UPDT_DT, NOTE, OPRTR_GRD, USE_YN, OPRTR_EMAIL, OPRTR_TEL, GRP_ID, OPRTR_STTS_CD, ADDNG_CD, MNG_INST_CD, OPRTR_STTS_CD FROM M_OP_OPERATOR WHERE OPRTR_NM = #{oprtrNm} AND OPRTR_TEL = #{oprtrTel}

SELECT OPRTR_ID, SYSTEM_CD, OPRTR_PSWD, OPRTR_NM, OPRTR_JBTTL, OPRTR_DEPT, UPDT_DT, NOTE, OPRTR_GRD, USE_YN, OPRTR_EMAIL, OPRTR_TEL, GRP_ID, OPRTR_STTS_CD, ADDNG_CD, MNG_INST_CD, OPRTR_STTS_CD FROM M_OP_OPERATOR WHERE OPRTR_NM = #{oprtrNm} AND OPRTR_TEL = #{oprtrTel} AND OPRTR_ID = #{oprtrId}
SELECT OPRTR_NM || '(' || OPRTR_EMAIL || ')' FROM M_OP_OPERATOR WHERE OPRTR_ID = #{oprtrId}
mapper.update: UPDATE M_OP_OPERATOR SET OPRTR_PSWD = #{oprtrPswd}, OPRTR_NM = #{oprtrNm}, OPRTR_JBTTL = #{oprtrJbttl}, OPRTR_DEPT = #{oprtrDept}, UPDT_DT = NOW(), GRP_ID = #{grpId}, ADDNG_CD = #{addngCd}, OPRTR_TEL = #{oprtrTel}, OPRTR_STTS_CD = #{oprtrSttsCd}, MNG_INST_CD = #{mngInstCd}, LAYOUT_NO = #{layoutNo} WHERE OPRTR_ID = #{oprtrId}
mapper.select: SELECT OPRTR_ID, GRP_ID, SYSTEM_CD, OPRTR_PSWD, OPRTR_NM, OPRTR_JBTTL, OPRTR_DEPT, UPDT_DT, NOTE, OPRTR_GRD, USE_YN, OPRTR_EMAIL, OPRTR_TEL, GRP_ID, OPRTR_STTS_CD, ADDNG_CD, MNG_INST_CD, OPRTR_STTS_CD FROM M_OP_OPERATOR WHERE OPRTR_EMAIL = #{oprtrEmail}

SELECT MOO.OPRTR_ID, MOO.OPRTR_EMAIL, MOO.OPRTR_TEL, MOO.OPRTR_STTS_CD, MOO.ADDNG_CD, MOO.OPRTR_NM, MOO.USE_YN, MOO.SYSTEM_CD, MOO.OPRTR_PSWD, MOO.OPRTR_JBTTL, MOO.OPRTR_DEPT, MOO.OPRTR_GRD, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MOO.OPRTR_REGIST_DD,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS OPRTR_REGIST_DD, MOO.GRP_ID, COALESCE(MOO.LAYOUT_NO,0) AS LAYOUT_NO, MOO.MNG_INST_CD, MOGI.GRP_NM FROM M_OP_OPERATOR MOO INNER JOIN M_OP_GRP_INFO MOGI ON MOO.GRP_ID = MOGI.GRP_ID WHERE MOO.OPRTR_ID = #{oprtrId}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY OPRTR_ID) AS rownum, MOO.OPRTR_ID, MOO.OPRTR_EMAIL, MOO.OPRTR_TEL, MOO.OPRTR_STTS_CD, MOO.ADDNG_CD, MOO.MNG_INST_CD, MOO.OPRTR_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MOO.OPRTR_REGIST_DD,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS OPRTR_REGIST_DD, MOGI.GRP_NM FROM M_OP_OPERATOR MOO INNER JOIN M_OP_GRP_INFO MOGI ON MOO.GRP_ID = MOGI.GRP_ID WHERE 1=1
AND MOO.GRP_ID = #{grpId}
AND
MOO.OPRTR_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%'
MOO.OPRTR_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%'
MOGI.GRP_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%'
( MOO.OPRTR_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%' OR MOO.OPRTR_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%' OR MOGI.GRP_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%' )
AND TO_DATE(#{strDt}, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_DATE(MOO.oprtr_regist_dd, 'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_DATE(MOO.oprtr_regist_dd, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_DATE(MOO.oprtr_regist_dd, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{strDt}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'YYYYMMDD')
AND MOO.OPRTR_STTS_CD LIKE #{oprtrSttsCd}
AND MOO.MNG_INST_CD = #{mngInstCd}
ORDER BY ROWNUM DESC
LIMIT 10 OFFSET (#{page} - 1) * 10

SELECT MOO.OPRTR_ID, MOO.OPRTR_EMAIL, MOO.OPRTR_TEL, MOO.OPRTR_STTS_CD, MOO.ADDNG_CD, MOO.OPRTR_NM, MOO.USE_YN, MOO.SYSTEM_CD, MOO.OPRTR_PSWD, MOO.OPRTR_JBTTL, MOO.OPRTR_DEPT, MOO.MNG_INST_CD, MOO.OPRTR_GRD, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MOO.OPRTR_REGIST_DD,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS OPRTR_REGIST_DD, MOO.GRP_ID FROM M_OP_OPERATOR MOO WHERE MOO.GRP_ID = #{grpId}

SELECT COUNT(MOO.*) FROM M_OP_OPERATOR MOO INNER JOIN M_OP_GRP_INFO MOGI ON MOO.GRP_ID = MOGI.GRP_ID WHERE 1=1
AND MOO.GRP_ID = #{grpId}
AND
MOO.OPRTR_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%'
MOO.OPRTR_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%'
MOGI.GRP_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%'
( MOO.OPRTR_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%' OR MOO.OPRTR_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%' OR MOGI.GRP_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%' )
AND MOO.OPRTR_STTS_CD LIKE #{oprtrSttsCd}
AND TO_DATE(#{strDt}, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_DATE(MOO.oprtr_regist_dd, 'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_DATE(MOO.oprtr_regist_dd, 'YYYYMMDD') <= TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'YYYYMMDD')
AND TO_DATE(MOO.oprtr_regist_dd, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{strDt}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDt}, 'YYYYMMDD')
AND MOO.MNG_INST_CD = #{mngInstCd}
SELECT COALESCE(LAYOUT_NO,0) AS LAYOUT_NO FROM M_OP_OPERATOR WHERE OPRTR_ID = #{oprtrId}
